letter.name: Prof. Leopold Verstraelen
letter.begin: Mr. Joe Smith 2345 Princess St. Edinburgh, EH1 1AA
letter.body:
Taking into account your proposals we would like to invite you to our Altsoft office in Belgium. You may visit us on any date most convenient for you in the period from September 15, 2003 to April 30, 2004.
All your local expenses related to this visit including accommodation, living expenses and medical insurance will be covered by Altsoft.
letter.ps: Do not forget that we are closed from December 25, 2003 to January 5, 2004
